item.title: How to Use Interactive Labels with OLED Technology in Marketing Campaigns Effectively
item.content:encoded:
Mar 21, 2024

How to Use Interactive Labels with OLED Technology in Marketing Campaigns Effectively

Light is all about visibility and the structure that follows it. Despite living in a digital, data driven world, we still seem to live in the dark, when it comes down to creating a successful marketing or branding campaign. In the dynamic and ever-changing world of marketing, customers are inundated with various types of content—primarily on social media, television, and even in real life—the challenge lies in crafting a successful and attention-grabbing marketing campaign, in a world that has seen it all on TikTok. In the past, we have been working with the world’s best brands and their marketing geniuses, that all utilized our technology to create captivating events and strategically position products in new channels. Reviewing these campaigns today we can see a clear structure on what is successful and not. Today, we want to share this knowledge with you on how to make run a successful in the new era of digitization and Gen-Z coming into the market. In this article, we will analyze the successful marketing campaigns mentioned earlier. We’ll examine the factors that contributed to their success and explore areas where improvements could have been made. Let’s delve deeper into this topic.

item.title: What it takes to make Smart Packaging become reality
item.content:encoded:
Apr 3, 2023

What it takes to make Smart Packaging become reality

For 30 years, smart packaging has been an idea that has failed to achieve larger market adoption and has generally been underwhelming despite various companies' attempts. Inuru's latest generation of luminous labels have been launched with CATTIER's brand reboot for Glamour, impressing even one of the oldest Champagne houses in the world. Our labels have all the necessary characteristics for market-ready solutions, and we discuss our key deliverables for smart packaging.

item.title: First World OLED Developers Conference Announced
item.content:encoded:
May 20, 2025

First World OLED Developers Conference Announced

Inuru is organizing its first-ever World OLED Developers Conference, bringing together designers, engineers, and creators to explore recent advancements in OLED technology. The event will highlight Inuru’s novel OLED manufacturing method, enabling cost-effective production of OLED lighting and displays in any shape or color. It also focuses on integrating OLEDs into various products, including packaging, textiles, and automotive parts. Attendees will participate in workshops, view demonstrations, and engage in shaping the roadmap from OLED illumination to complex display systems.

item.title: We print displays-Inuru Prints Active Matrix OLED Display
item.content:encoded:
May 6, 2025

We print displays-Inuru Prints Active Matrix OLED Display

Inuru, a leading European OLED display manufacturer, has achieved a major breakthrough by successfully printing OLED displays in three separate colors using its current-generation technology. Based in Berlin/Wildau, Germany, Inuru has confirmed its compatibility with active matrix backplanes—the standard for modern high-resolution screens—paving the way for affordable, flexible displays in packaging, wearables, and smart appliances. This milestone positions Inuru among the most innovative display manufacturers in Europe, offering printed OLED solutions beyond traditional TV and smartphone applications.
